question: 更衣室
sourceMnemonic: An <kanji>again</kanji> <kanji>clothes</kanji> <kanji>room</kanji> is a <vocabulary>changing room</vocabulary>. You get to change again, even after changing in the morning for the first time to leave your house. This can also be a <vocabulary>locker room</vocabulary> or a <vocabulary>dressing room</vocabulary>, so really anywhere you can change that's not your home, usually.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
